author: FourFourTwo
description: Vinicius Junior highlighted Cristiano Ronaldo and Gareth Bale as players he likes after sealing his move to Real Madrid.
title: Playing with Cristiano Ronaldo still hasn't sunk in, says new Real Madrid signing Vinicius Junior

description: The Spanish Tax Authorities (Agencia Tributaria) consider that Real Madrid football superstar Cristiano Ronaldo defrauded over 8 million euros ($8.95 million) by not correctly declaring his image rights for the period between 2011 and 2013, according to media reports in Spain.
title: Cristiano Ronaldo defrauded nearly $9 mn in tax: Report - Times of India

author: FourFourTwo
description: Renato Sanches, Eder and Anthony Lopes are not in Portugal's Confederations Cup squad, but Cristiano Ronaldo is.
title: Ronaldo in Portugal's Confederations Cup squad as Sanches misses out

author: FourFourTwo
description: Zinedine Zidane has explained the understanding that helped the "unbelievable" Cristiano Ronaldo stay fresh for the end of the season.
title: Ronaldo agreed he needed more rest, says Zidane

author: Spiegel Online
description: Die Steuerakte Cristiano Ronaldo liegt jetzt bei der Staatsanwaltschaft Madrid. Der Weltfußballer wäre der sechste Spieler, gegen den nach Veröffentlichungen von Football Leaks   Anklage erhoben wird.
title: Ermittlungen in Spanien: Ronaldo soll 15 Millionen Euro Steuern hinterzogen haben
